import React from 'react' import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'; import { Container, Grid, Button, InputLabel, FormControl,Select,Input } from '@material-ui/core'; import useStyles from "./styles" const AdminActionButtons = () => { const classes = useStyles(); return ( <> Add category
{errorMsg && showErrorMsg(errorMsg)} {successMsg && showSuccessMsg(successMsg)} { loading ? ( Loading() ) : ( Category : {category} handlechangeCategory(e)} /> ) }
Add Product
{errorMsg && showErrorMsg(errorMsg)} {successMsg && showSuccessMsg(successMsg)} { loading ? ( Loading() ) : ( Product Details :
Choose Product

Select Category
) }
) } export default AdminActionButtons
